div.p: This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/NIHSS5MotorArm defines the following codes:

tr.td: No drift; limb holds 90 (or 45) degrees for full 10 seconds.
Drift; limb holds 90 (or 45) degrees, but drifts down before full 10 seconds; does not hit bed or other support.
Some effort against gravity; limb cannot get to or maintain (if cued) 90 (or 45) degrees, drifts down to bed, but has some effort against gravity.
No effort against gravity; limb falls.

title.value: The National Institute of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) - 5. Motor Arm

publisher.value: Sundhedsvæsnets Kvalistetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

name.value: Sundhedsvæsnets Kvalistetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

description.value: The National Institute of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) - 5. Motor Arm; Link: https://www.ninds.nih.gov/stroke-scales-and-related-information

definition.value: No drift; limb holds 90 (or 45) degrees for full 10 seconds.
Drift; limb holds 90 (or 45) degrees, but drifts down before full 10 seconds; does not hit bed or other support.
Some effort against gravity; limb cannot get to or maintain (if cued) 90 (or 45) degrees, drifts down to bed, but has some effort against gravity.
No effort against gravity; limb falls.
